overview: "Axemusic" is the third live album and DVD in the career of Brazilian singer and songwriter Claudia Leitte. The album was released in CD and DVD formats by Som Livre on January 16, 2014. The recording of the album took place on August 3, 2013 during a show of the event "The Greatest Show in the World" in Recife, Pernambuco. During the recording, the singer received the participation of Luiz Caldas, Wesley Safadão, Wanessa, Naldo Benny, Maracatu Puerto Rico Nation, Armandinho and the dance group Zumba Fitness.
title: Axemusic (Ao Vivo)
